name: AFTERGLOW (itch) (Bunnyviking, AJtheSquirrel)
description: You were supposed to die. You did it for love. When the sun finally died you stayed behind to trigger the AFTERGLOW system that would contain the supernova and prevent destruction of the outer planets. You did not die. Somehow you absorbed the AFTERGLOW radiation and now you are light. You must glow or be absorbed. Love waits on the moon. Run.
